metadata.description: How much you help each other evolve and become better versions of yourselves
metadata.sentence_template: For personal growth, this relationship is ___.

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Pluto aspects show transformation potential. North Node shows growth direction. Chiron shows healing opportunities.

very_low.label: Draining
very_low.guidance: May learn but at high emotional cost; ask if price feels worth it.

low.label: Rough Mirror
low.guidance: Teach through friction; talk about patterns reflected back.

mid.label: Neutral
mid.guidance: Doesn't block or supercharge growth; more about comfort.

high.label: Expanding
high.guidance: Help each other stretch gently out of comfort zones.

very_high.label: Transforming
very_high.guidance: Deep catalyst; can change who you are, for real.
